short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your new tab page fun - Star Field extension adds amazing background to your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ðŸŒŸ We designed this extension to add some fun to your desktop. ðŸŒŸ

Star Field is a new tab extension. It overtakes your new tab and customizes it by adding a vivid star pattern over your working space. 

By clicking "Add to Chrome", you accept and agree to installing the Star Field extension and setting Chromeâ„¢ new tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. The extension will update your search settings and will change your search engine to be powered by Bing.

When we created this extension, we thought about covering all the aspects one productive person needs. For example, mentioning that, aside from the fun part - Star field offers you a calm working space that will prevent any distraction so you can stay in your complete focus. 

We also didn't forget about your bookmarks. Your old ones will be saved and automatically added to the modified new tab page, but there is also space for recent bookmarks.
